question: Match the column-I with Column-II. Choose the correct option given below.
Column-I: (a) Streptococcus, (b) Penicillium, (c) Methanogens, (d) Anabaena
Column-II: i. Free living nitrogen fixing bacteria, ii. Clot buster, iii. Source of antibiotic, iv. Biogas production
explanation: *Streptococcus* produces Streptokinase (clot buster); *Penicillium* produces antibiotics; Methanogens produce biogas; *Anabaena* is a nitrogen fixer [cite: 162-170, 476].
